meanings.definition: A salt or ester of picric acid.
meanings.sent1: The scientist carefully studied the picrate under the microscope.
meanings.sent2: She added the picrate to the solution to observe the reaction.
meanings.sent3: The picrate decided to throw a party for all the other compounds.
meanings.sent4: The picrate stood out in the chemical mixture like a bright star in the night sky.
meanings.sent5: The vivid yellow color of the picrate made it easy to identify in the lab.

meanings.definition: A compound formed by the reaction of picric acid with a base.
meanings.sent1: The students conducted an experiment to create a picrate in the lab.
meanings.sent2: The picrate formed a stable compound with the base used in the reaction.
meanings.sent3: The picrate and the base danced together in the test tube.
meanings.sent4: The picrate bonded with the base as if they were long-lost friends.
meanings.sent5: The explosive nature of the picrate compound was evident during the experiment.
